Banner.title: PHILOMATH
Banner.text: Elevate your front-end skills with timeless & expertly crafted courses

Hello.title: Hello
Hello.description_init: I am Evangelia, a multifaceted solopreneur launching ventures that inspire growth and transformation across four distinct brands, all dedicated to empowering individuals and fostering excellence.
Hello.description_after_technology: I upskill frontend engineers with versatile, framework-agnostic skills, focusing on browser mechanics, core concepts, and AI integration in frontend development.
Hello.description_after_wellness: I offer a range of recyclable products that promote a healthy body and active lifestyle, including activewear, skincare, and nutritious food.
Hello.description_after_cultural_understanding: I help individuals navigate the challenges of living in different countries, empowering them to embrace change and succeed as expats.
Hello.description_after_creative_expression: aims to generate insightful content through interviews, documentaries, and articles that explore societal issues and perspectives.
